body: We can add an option for ExistValidator to spcify using the master db, how about that? @yanhuixie @samdark

Thanks for your reply, @rossoneri ! I think it's a good idea. 
It's reliable that save and retrieve the "foo" from the same db node.
What we should remind (in documentation?) is that there are some premises to do so.
1) config correctly in Yii2 'db' component (master and slaves).
2) the db nodes may NOT behind a proxy middle-ware/load balancer or config it works as read/write splitting mode, but not multi-master mode.
